subject: Pro X Ultra Pedals
description_text:
Hello,

I recently bought the pro x ultra pedals and upon inspecting my brake pedal
I see there are two wires that come out from underneath, you have one which
connects to the control box and another wire I am unsure what it connects
to. It’s a black, red, and white wire. I attached an image for reference!

Best,
Marcio S.

conversations.body_text: Hi Marcio Serrano,  This cable is for the baseboard LED strip. If you haven’t purchased a baseboard, you can ignore this cable.
